hadith.chapter: The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj) - كتاب المناسك
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا مسدد، حدثنا حفص بن غياث، عن جعفر، بإسناده زاد ‏"‏ فانحروا في رحالكم ‏"‏ ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The aforesaid tradition has also been transmitted by Hafs bin Ghiyath from Ja’far with the same chain of narrators. But this version adds “Sacrifice in your dwellings.”
